comment: Quizzes are nonsense, and grading is very harsh. Discussion posts are very lengthy and he often gives 2 quizzes and 2 discussion posts in one week. He does not grade based off rubric, if he thinks your past discussion was better even though it meets the requirements, he will deduct points from the grade...

Poor communication and the quizzes are hard, which are the biggest hits in terms of the point grading system. The required paper is also very vague in terms of directions, although it is a very open topic for the student to choose what to research.
rating_tags: Tough grader--Get ready to read--Graded by few things

comment: Professor Bailey just gives weekly discussions, quizzes, a midterm, and final. It was pretty easy considering you just have to read the chapter and elaborate on what was said. The only thing I would say is that for the writing assignment the instructions could have been more clear but it may have just been me.

The course is straightforward weekly discussions and quizzes (Five min each), an informal paper, and a midterm and final. Grades were always delayed along with email responses. However, he wasn't a very strict grader. Easy A.

Tony Bailey is a real gem. He is a great professor and the class I took with him was a lot of fun and I really enjoyed it. The textbook is required and the assignments are all online and entirely based off of the textbook. His tests/ quizzes definitely aren't easy but there are other grades he offers that help to keep your grade up. Great teacher!
Loved having him as a professor. He was hilarious and personable. So easy too!

I seriously recommend this man to anyone wanting to take this class. He loves his work and teaching the students and makes the class really fun. Brings in a few guest speakers over the semester and does group activities. You will need to read from the book and do online discussions but they're easy if you put in the effort. Overall, worth it.

Great professor and guy all around. His lectures are kind of boring, but he makes them fun and interesting with his stories. He also brings in guest speakers and does a lot of group activities to keep things interesting. He really is passionate about his career and what he teaches. Would love to work for him some day.

Tony was the best professor I have ever had. I strongly recommend him as a professor that anyone should take. He is a great teacher and an even better person. You can tell he cares about you as a person and wants everyone to retain the material and learn.

Attended Chief Baileys' Police Administration course this fall, and I must admit I anticipated a long boring lecture everyday. His classes were the exact opposite, he is a very lively individual and he knows his craft. He breathes, eats, and probably dreams about policing. He is a great professor, I highly recommend him. Easy way to boost GPA.

Professor Bailey is amazing. I had him for Police Administration, and he is the police chief for West Point, GA  so he knows what he is talking about. You need the book! Most of the assignments are straight out of there or a sign in sheet for discussions in class. As long as you don't make him mad all tests are with a group and open notes/book.

Easy A class. Class is based around small little assignments, quizzes, and participation. Go to class for participation because it is randomly accessed. Quizzes are usually open book and easy. Assignments in class are easy and out of class are easy. Must take. He is hilarious and a great professor. He is the chief of police at West Point. Got an A!

He is by far the Absolute Best Professor I have ever taken and I'm a senior I have nothing bad to say about him. No power points I hate lecturers he makes the material come to life so you will learn while bein entertained he's super funny. However, he's super knowledgable as well just show up keep up do the work pass the class ENJOY!
Absolutely loved this professor. He is a police officer who knows his stuff and is excellent at teaching. He's interesting, funny, and a fair grader. Take Bailey.

You MUST take this professor if at all possible. He's hilarious, informative, and gives you real world assignments to complete during class making this class an easy A if you simply show up. He uses the book a lot for online quizzes (I tried going without it for 1 quiz and got a 40%. Impossible to google the quiz questions)so definitely buy it.
